channel.title: Modify Watches: Popular Products
channel.description: A list of the popular products at Modify Watches.

item.title: Orange Face
item.description:
The Orange watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match the this design with any other straps from your Modify collection. The face is made from a scratch-resistant polycar..

Price: $25.00

item.title: The Clubber Lang
item.description:
The The Clubber Lang comes with one Orange watch face and one Blue Light strap. the watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your modify collection. the strap is made from a soft and comfortable silicone material, the face is made from a scratch-res..

Price: $40.00
